name: Seperate Shooters!
description:
{{{{MAKE SURE TO CLICK ON THE PILOT QUICKLY IF YOU WANT TO ROTATE IT,  OTHERWISE, YOU MIGHT ACIDENTALLY GRAB IT}}}}

{I highly suggest checking out the controls!}

/// All art made by me ///

Welcome to Separate Shooters, a game about 2 flying projectile launching things which defend themselves and their hearts with bullets.

This game fits the theme of "Separation" because the player controls two separate entities.

Any questions? No? Good.

Lilu.io link: [https://liluo.io/enigmagical/seperate-shooters]
